title: Changsha Sleek Escape with Indoor Rooftop Pool
description: Experience China’s vibrant city of Changsha with a stay at the modern Crowne Plaza Changsha Development Zone, an IHG Hotel. Discover the city’s vast history of culture and urban growth with a visit to the fabulous museums, before returning to this sleek hotel to relax and unwind. Take a dip in the stylish indoor swimming pool, where the ceiling is made of glass, keep up with your fitness routine at the fully equipped gym, and enjoy a bite to eat at Gourmet restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Changsha Development Zone, an IHG Hotel

title: Changsha Stylish Sky-High Escape with Onsite Dining and Indoor Pool
description:
Soar above the city with a stay at this five-star haven in the heart of bustling Changsha, the capital of Hunan. Park Hyatt Changsha offers an array of exceptional experiences - from classic Hunan cuisine at Lilan Restaurant and elegant afternoon tea to creative cocktails served with dazzling skyline views at Lilan Bar. With Changsha IFS Tower steps away, world-class shopping is on your doorstep.

Step beyond the hotel to uncover the city's rich cultural heritage. Explore the storied grounds of Yuelu Academy, stroll along the scenic Xiangjiang River or immerse yourself in the lively energy of local markets and their delicacies. After a day of discovery, retreat to the serene indoor pool and soak in sweeping views of the cityscape.
offer_address: Tower 2, Changsha IFS, 188 Jiefang West Road, Furong District Changsha 410005, China

title: Contemporary China Escape in Changsha with Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description:
This urban sanctuary strikes the perfect balance between business convenience and contemporary comfort. Just steps from the exhibition centre, it’s ideal for stress-free work trips with well-appointed rooms. After a busy day, kick back with a meal of delicious Hunan cuisine at the Food Exchange.

This hotel is located in a prime spot, with the best of the city just a quick ride away. Wander the buzzing Huangxing Road for shops and street snacks, catch skyline views from Yuelu Mountain, or check out ancient treasures at the Hunan Museum.

title: Changsha Riverside Glamour with Ultra-Trendy Top-Floor Bar
description: Resting on the banks of the Xiangjiang River is the modern and buzzing city of Changsha, home to the InterContinental Changsha, an IHG Hotel. Here, dine at the city's most elaborate buffet restaurant (there's everything from seafood to sushi and meat carving stations), or opt for a fine dining extravaganza at Zhi Wei Xuan Chinese Restaurant at sunset. For something extra special, head to Sky27, located on the top floor with stellar views of the river and city lights.
offer_address: No.1500 Xiangjiang North Road, Kaifu District, Changsha, 410000, China

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Changsha Meixi Lake, an IHG Hotel
title: Sophisticated Hunan Stay with Views of Meixi Lake & Rooftop Pool
description: Meet sophistication at Hotel Indigo Changsha Meixi Lake, an IHG Hotel, conveniently positioned in the heart of Changsha's vibrant Meixi Lake District. Explore the nearby Yuelu Mountain and Orange Island, indulge in the city's famous spicy cuisine at local eateries, or simply enjoy the stunning lake views from your room. End your day with a cocktail at the bar, gazing at the city's glittering skyline, or with a scenic swim.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Changsha Meixi Lake, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.745 Huanhu Road, Yuelu District, Changsha, HU 410205 Mainland China
